name: crc1607_seq_v1_assay
displayName: If the sequencing technique is not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_assaykit
displayName: The title of the kit/biologicals used.
column5: TruSeq RNA Library Prep Kit v2

name: crc1607_seq_v1_doe
displayName: Date or a rough date when the assay was performed.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_instru
displayName: Device used for sequencing. If it is not in the list, select Other and fill it in the next field.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_sampleid
displayName: Self-defined sample ID(s). Make sure using the same ID from the sample metadata.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_runid
displayName: Self-defined ID or Folder name in local path where Run data is stored.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_libselect
displayName: A category header for the library selection detatils.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_qc
displayName: If any QC procedure applied for this experiment.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_relvpaper
displayName: Link or DOI of the literature that is relevant to this experiment.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_finddata
displayName: (For metadata provider) Local path, folder name where data are store, private repository, etc. (For sharing) path in shared folder, link to public repository, etc.

name: crc1607_seq_v1_notes
displayName: Notes about this experiment. Either for fellow researchers or to the metadata provider in the future.
